category_subtitle: Post-Super Bowl Recovery — It's Pizza Time!

rounds.pro_tip: SURFACE TEXTURE: Real pizza has uneven char patterns, irregular bubble formation, and natural oil pooling. AI pizza tends to have suspiciously uniform cheese distribution.
CHEESE PHYSICS: Real melted cheese stretches with organic, random breakpoints. AI cheese often looks like smooth plastic or stretches too uniformly.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic overhead shot of a pepperoni pizza slice with cheese pull, wooden table, natural lighting, 8k'

rounds.pro_tip: GREASE PATTERNS: Real pepperoni produces small pools of orange grease in uneven distribution. AI often misses these subtle liquid details.
HANDS & FINGERS: Look at the hands. AI frequently generates extra or fused fingers, impossible joint angles, or blurred fingertips.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic chef tossing pizza dough in air, rustic Italian kitchen, flour dust, warm lighting'

rounds.pro_tip: DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with gradual focus falloff. AI images often have abrupt transitions between sharp and blurry areas.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — brick pizza oven with flames (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: FIRE & FLAME: Real flames are chaotic with unpredictable edges and translucent tips. AI fire often looks like a smooth gradient blob.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic brick wood-fired pizza oven with roaring flames, Neapolitan pizza cooking inside, warm glow, rustic restaurant'

rounds.pro_tip: SHADOW CONSISTENCY: Real photos have a single consistent light source. AI sometimes has shadows pointing in multiple directions.
TEXT & LABELS: Look for text on menus, napkins, or bottles. AI frequently generates garbled nonsense text — one of the most reliable tells.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic dinner table with multiple pizzas, wine glasses, candles, Italian restaurant ambiance, friends sharing food'

rounds.pro_tip: MATERIAL TRANSITIONS: Real photos show natural transitions between materials — stone to mortar, dough to sauce. AI often blurs these boundaries.
ORGANIC IMPERFECTION: Real tomatoes have blemishes and varied sizes. AI produce is suspiciously perfect — uniform coloring, identical shapes.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic overhead flatlay of fresh pizza ingredients: tomatoes, basil, mozzarella, flour, olive oil on marble counter'
